_docs: Each gig object: id (unique slug), date (YYYY-MM-DD), venue, city, country, title (optional headline), description, photos (array of filenames without extension), coverPhoto (filename without ext), youtubeUrls (array), credits (object of role: name). Photos live in assets/gigs/<id>/{thumbs,1200,2000}/<filename>.webp

gigs.title: Support for Deltawelle at ArtBar
gigs.description: Opening for German indie/new wave band Deltawelle at ArtBar in Brno. Our second gig and first time playing support for an international act.

gigs.title: First Concert at Dziupla
gigs.description: Our very first concert. Four songs, one stage, and the beginning of everything. Dziupla Club in Cesky Tesin gave us the perfect intimate setting to debut live.
